name: Bit Platformer (ZeeKenn)
description:
use wasd to move

e to attack

q to heal

c to unleash vengeful spirit

space to dash (if unlocked)

hold w for double jump (if unlocked)

press down while jumping to kill enemies below you (if unlocked)

This project game is about a little square cube is going to an adventure to a mysterious place. He is going to a journey to find the rarest element on earth------astatine. Only this element is going to cure his sick and old grandfather. He is the only one who is fit and strong enough in his family for this almost impossible mission. But this element is heavily guarded by many different creatures in the world. On his mission, he will collect powers to defeat the enemies. He will also face many challenges and difficulties on his journey. So, his journey to astatine begins.............................
